message: Take it or leave it, Bob. It's a good deal for both of us, especially for you. We have plenty of rounds left!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 60/40 split. It's a fair starting point for negotiation.

Bob, let's be realistic. My offer is still very generous, and it's in your best interest to accept. Every round that passes makes the money worth less for you, and we're running out of time. Don't risk losing everything!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now.  A fair deal is better than risking both our shares shrinking to nothing.
